fields.label: Flexible Content
fields.name: flexible_content
fields.instructions:
Use Flexible content to add extra content to page. 
E.g. extra text areas, photo galleries, Press, Repertoire etc. Click 'Add Row' to start adding content.

sub_fields.label: About
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the details of each artist

sub_fields.label: Main Category
sub_fields.name: main_category
sub_fields.instructions: i.e. Conductor, Musician etc.

sub_fields.label: Gallery Section
sub_fields.name: gallery_section
sub_fields.instructions: Add all galleries required

sub_fields.label: Gallery Description
sub_fields.name: gallery_description
sub_fields.instructions: Short description of gallery

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: image_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Upload images of the same dimensions in order to keep the gallery tidy

sub_fields.label: Image Credit
sub_fields.name: image_credit
sub_fields.instructions: Image credit can be prefixed with © and will appear below the image after it is clicked.

sub_fields.label: Unique Section Name
sub_fields.name: unique_id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter name of section i.e. Press. Text will appear in the red bar at the top of the page and allow the page to scroll to this section

sub_fields.label: Banner Copy
sub_fields.name: banner_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Enter copy including headers

sub_fields.label: Date
sub_fields.name: date
sub_fields.instructions: Enter Date

sub_fields.label: Text area one
sub_fields.name: text_area_one
sub_fields.instructions: eg. Beethoven

sub_fields.name: text_area_two
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. Concentus Musicus Wien

sub_fields.name: press_article
sub_fields.instructions: Input details, links, articles of Press
